section.title: Deckwash
section.para: The ship's deckwash system serves two hose connector outlets located on the aft-deck and fore-deck lockers.

The deckwash system is normally fed by fresh water from the ship's pressurised domestic water system, but the D.WASH control at the helm can be used to feed the aft outlet with raw water pumped from a through-hull inlet in the engine room.

section.title: Winterisation
section.para: In freezing weather, the above deck pipework should be drained down through the bleed and isolation valves located in the engine room and the master cabin wardrobe.
